metadata.title: CVE-2016-1855 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: WebKit, as used in Apple iOS before 9.3.2, Safari before 9.1.1, and tvOSbefore 9.2.1, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause adenial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted web site, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2016-1854, CVE-2016-1856, and CVE-2016-1857.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
